Logopandecteision, or, An introdvction to the vniversal langvage digested into these six several books, Neaudethaumata, Chrestasbeia, Cleronomaporia, Chryseomystes, Nelcadicastes, & Philoponauxesis / by Sir Thomas Urquhart of Cromartie ... Urquhart, Thomas, Sir, 1611-1660.
[8], 77, [3], 50, [16] p.
Printed and are to be sold by Giles Calvert ... and by Richard Tomlins ..., London : 1653.
"Now lately contrived and published both for his own utilities and that of all pregnant and ingenious spirits." Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
